content.plan:
1. Navigate to Nike India homepage and ensure it loads completely, verifying key visual signals and closing any promotional pop‑ups.
2. Activate the search input, type "black running shoes", submit the query, and verify that the results page displays matching products.
3. Click the first black running shoe result and confirm the product detail page loads with size options displayed.
4. Verify that size 10 is listed as available, select size 10, and click "Add to Bag".
5. Confirm the "Added to Bag" success indication appears.
6. Navigate to the cart page and validate that the black running shoe appears with size 10 and quantity 1.
